descriptionHTML:
With highly visible date (month, day, day of week), time, and battery level, week number and moon phase.

12/24h time format (follows the one set on the phone).

Available in 19 languages (provided that your phone and/or your watch support these languages): Arabic, Bengali, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin Chinese, Norwegian (Bokmål), Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish.

For Android Wear smartwatches. Support for Android Wear 1 and 2.

Installation FAQs: http://pixeloftime.com/faq/

If you like the watch, please give it a rating or a review. Thanks!
